mapper.insert: insert into board(bid, btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bcount, bregdate, bsort, cfn) values(seq_board.nextval, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter}, 0, sysdate, #{bsort}, #{cfn})
mapper.select:
select * from board where 1=1
and bsort=#{bsort}
and btitle like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
and bcontent like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
and (btitle like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%' or bcontent like '%'||#{searchValue}||'%')
order by bid desc
